snippet: Because of recent incidents with the jet’s battery, an advanced feature allowing for new flight paths may not receive approval for months, which could dilute the jet’s appeal.
abstract: Problems with battery in Boeing's technologically advanced 787 jet delays plans to offer advanced features that allow for extended flight plans to any airport around the world without stopping; Boeing estimates delayed technology allowing 330 minutes of flight will create 450 new routes.

byline.original: By JAD MOUAWAD and CHRISTOPHER DREW

lead_paragraph: Because of recent incidents with the jet’s battery, an advanced feature allowing for new flight paths may not receive approval for months, which could dilute the jet’s appeal.

headline.main: Setback to Boeing’s Hopes for Longer Range for 787
headline.print_headline: Setback to Boeing’s Hopes for Longer Range for 787
